title: 25 Vegetarian Recipes : The Lean Veg Kitchen
tagline: Clean vegetarian meals designed for fat loss.
description: 25 macro-balanced vegetarian recipes using paneer, dals, and whole grains — crafted for clean eating, satiety, and weight loss.

section_1.title: Salad Bowls & Healthy Bowls
section_1.description: Fresh, filling bowls with high-protein ingredients like rajma, tofu, quinoa, and soya chunks — ideal for lunch or light dinner.

section_1.title: Curries & Khichdi
section_1.description: Balanced Indian-style vegetarian mains made with clean ingredients like tofu, spinach, and quinoa for comfort and nutrition.

section_1.title: Quick Snacks & Light Meals
section_1.description: Sandwiches, wraps, rolls, and stir-fries crafted for taste and macros — perfect for small meals, post-workout bites, or mid-day fuel.

section_1.title: Pasta & Fusion Dishes
section_1.description: Continental-style meals using paneer and veggies, with an Indian twist — designed for variety and clean indulgence.

section_1.title: Smoothies & Drinks
section_1.description: Macro-friendly smoothies for breakfast or post-training recovery, loaded with protein, healthy fats, and clean carbs.

section_1.title: Soups
section_1.description: Low-calorie, digestion-friendly soups rich in protein and fiber — great for light dinners or reset days.

features_desc: Welcome to The Lean Veg Kitchen — a high-protein, fat-loss-focused cookbook for those who want real results without giving up their love for vegetarian food. Inside, you’ll find 25 macro-balanced vegetarian recipes, designed to keep you full, fuel fat loss, and deliver clean energy.
features: Vegetarian protein sources like paneer, legumes, and grains
Indian + global recipes with macro-friendly design
Easy-to-cook meals with local ingredients
Crafted for lean muscle, satiety, and flavor
why_this_book_desc: Most vegetarian diets are carb-heavy and protein-light — not ideal for cutting fat. The Lean Veg Kitchen fixes that with carefully structured meals built around fat loss and flavor. No boring salads. No dry meals. Just real food for real progress.
why_this_book: Designed for vegetarians serious about fat loss
Paneer and dals used with portion control and balance
Desi flavors with global variety
Clear macro goals to support your cut
Works for busy schedules and active lifestyles
bonus: Includes vegetarian protein swaps and macro chart!

title: 25 Non-Vegetarian Recipes : The Shred Kitchen
tagline: High-protein chicken, fish, and egg meals to burn fat and stay full.
description: 25 lean and flavorful non-veg recipes using chicken, fish, and eggs — designed for fat loss, muscle retention, and clean eating.

section_1.title: Salad Bowls & Power Bowls
section_1.description: Protein-packed meals served in a bowl with greens, grains, or legumes — perfect for lunch or dinner.

section_1.title: Sandwiches & Rolls
section_1.description: High-protein non-veg sandwiches and wraps ideal for clean eating on the go or meal prep.

section_1.title: Sauce-Based Chicken Dishes
section_1.description: Flavorful, fat-loss-friendly chicken recipes paired with yogurt, herbs, or clean sauces.

section_1.title: Soups
section_1.description: Light, healing, and protein-rich soups — perfect for digestion, reset days, or low-cal dinners.

section_1.title: Smoothies
section_1.description: A refreshing, protein-supported green smoothie for clean energy and hydration.

features_desc: Welcome to The Shred Kitchen — your go-to cookbook for non-vegetarian fat loss meals. Inside, you’ll find 25 macro-focused recipes using chicken, fish, and eggs to help you build lean muscle, shred fat, and stay energized. These aren’t boring boiled meals — they’re flavor-packed, fitness-first plates.
features: High-protein meals using lean chicken, fish, and eggs
Balanced macros for sustainable fat loss
Indian + global recipe styles with bold flavors
Quick to cook and gym-goal approved
why_this_book_desc: Most non-veg plans focus on bulk or indulgence — not smart fat loss. The Shred Kitchen changes that by offering clean, satisfying, and macro-calibrated meals that are easy to prepare, delicious to eat, and effective for cutting fat while preserving muscle.
why_this_book: Fat-loss focused, not just high-protein
Zero-oil cooking options without losing flavor
Mix of Indian spices and global seasoning
Macros designed for lean transformation
Perfect for gym-goers, athletes, and busy professionals
bonus: Includes non-veg macro tracker and protein portion cheat sheet!

title: 25 Vegan Recipes : The Vegan Muscle Kitchen
tagline: Plant-powered meals to fuel your fitness.
description: 25 vibrant vegan recipes for energy, recovery, and clean eating using lentils, tofu, and whole foods.

section_1.title: Soups
section_1.description: Warm, protein-rich broths and soups ideal for dinner or recovery meals.

section_1.title: Salad Bowls
section_1.description: Fiber-filled, crunchy bowls with lentils, beans, quinoa, seeds, and greens.

section_1.title: Wraps & Rolls
section_1.description: Tempeh, tofu, and jackfruit wraps made for flavor and post-workout balance.

section_1.title: Healthy Bowls
section_1.description: Complete one-bowl meals for satiety, strength, and fat-burning fuel.

section_1.title: Toasts, Sandwiches & Muffins
section_1.description: Savory morning meals and grab-and-go sandwiches made clean.

section_1.title: Pasta
section_1.description: Dairy-free, protein-enhanced pasta dishes using lentils, tofu, and veggies.

section_1.title: Patties & Parathas
section_1.description: High-protein Indian-inspired mains with flaxseeds, tofu, millet, and more.

section_1.title: Snacks & Smoothies
section_1.description: Muscle-repairing bites and post-workout smoothies to power recovery.

features_desc: Welcome to The Vegan Muscle Kitchen — your clean eating blueprint for fat loss, strength, and energy through plants. Inside, you’ll find 25 macro-calibrated vegan recipes built for real fitness goals — not fads.
features: Complete or complementary plant protein sources
High-fiber meals for digestion and satiety
Indian + global flavor combinations
No soy overload, no gimmicks — just real results
why_this_book_desc: Most vegan cookbooks focus on general wellness or weight maintenance — not fat loss and muscle support. This edition changes that with real structure, science-backed combinations, and macros that matter.
why_this_book: Each meal delivers 15–25g protein from whole foods
Designed for fat loss, muscle recovery, and energy
Includes full-day variety: bowls, soups, smoothies & more
Perfect for clean-eating vegans serious about results
Balanced macros, easy ingredients, and bold flavors

features_desc: Welcome to The Lean Plant Kitchen — your complete toolkit for clean, meat-free meals that burn fat and build energy. Whether you're vegan, vegetarian, or somewhere in between, these 50 recipes keep you full, fit, and fueled for results.
features: 25 vegan + 25 vegetarian high-protein meals
Complete and complementary protein combinations
Indian + global flavor profiles with macro balance
Designed for weight loss, satiety, and muscle support
why_this_book_desc: This combo edition combines the best of both worlds — 100% meat-free, but filled with bold, effective meals built for fitness and flavor. Whether you're aiming to cut fat, stay lean, or maintain energy without meat, this book delivers structure and satisfaction.
why_this_book: Perfect for fat-loss focused vegans and vegetarians
Built on whole foods — no junk, no shortcuts
Optimized for digestion, energy, and satiety
Great for mixed households with both diets
Every recipe is under ~350 kcal with smart macros
bonus: Includes plant-based protein guide and macro swap chart!

features: 25 vegetarian + 25 non-veg high-protein recipes
Macro-balanced meals for fat loss and muscle support
Indian classics and global fitness meals included
Made for energy, recovery, and lean body goals
why_this_book_desc: This combo edition blends clean vegetarian recipes with lean non-veg options — giving you the freedom to fuel your goals without restricting your lifestyle. Whether you eat eggs and chicken or prefer paneer and pulses, this book fits your fat-loss journey.
why_this_book: Balanced for fat loss, satiety, and real-world flexibility
Each recipe crafted to support strength and lean eating
Great for couples or families with mixed preferences
Clear macro structure and minimal prep steps
Your choice: meat-free or meat-fueled — results either way

features: 75 total meals — 25 each from vegan, vegetarian, and non-veg diets
Macro-calibrated meals under ~350 kcal each
Ideal for individuals, families, or multi-diet homes
Every recipe designed for fat loss, fullness, and function
why_this_book_desc: Tired of restrictive plans that don’t fit your real life? The Triple Burn Kitchen gives you structured, high-protein recipes across all diets. You don’t need to choose sides — just choose progress. This book adapts to your needs and still delivers results.
why_this_book: Works for all food preferences and mixed households
Clear macro balance for sustainable fat loss
Flexible plans: cut fat without confusion or compromise
Includes global and Indian-style dishes for variety
From tofu to paneer to grilled chicken — one guide, three paths
bonus: Includes fat-loss meal planner, macro swap sheet, and protein tracker!
